name: Pokémon: Crystal Version
description: Travel back to the world of Johto as the Gold & Silver series continues with brand-new features!Whether you're reading the fresh descriptions in your Pokedex, using the unique sort function to organize your Pokémon in new ways, watching the all-new battle animations, or discovering another way to capture Suicune, you'll need all of your Poke-skills to master Pokémon Crystal on your Game Boy Color!
